Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • cardPile
      • Deck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Card>

    public class Deck
extends cardPile
    Deck class the creates the deck with 52 cards and gives each a suit and value. Then Shuffles the cards in the deck
    Author:
    Mikae
